0: I can't believe it... I've completed my maid training!
1: It seems like only yesterday I was a tiny fledgling maid learning from Lady Felicia... I can still hear her reprimands...
2: Hmm, it doesn't seem like anyone else will need to be served today. Perhaps I should go over everything before my first assignment...
3: Welcome to Maid Rush Madness! The goal of the game is to serve dishes to your increasingly demanding guests.
4: Ingredients for recipes will fall out of the sky. You need to move Serafina under them to catch them!
5: You can move Serafina left and right using the arrow keys.
6: You'll catch an ingredient when it falls and collides with Serafina! Your currently held ingredients can be seen on her plate.
7: Catch 3 ingredients to make a dish! There are a lot of combinations that lead to certain dishes, and some don't lead to any dishes at all...
8: When you have created a dish, it'll show up on your plate! You can't catch any more ingredients until you serve your currently held dish.
9: To serve your current dish, press the spacebar!
10: (Tip: If your plate only has ingredients and you haven't made a dish yet, you can press space to clear your plate!)
11: You need to serve dishes before time runs out! The timer at the bottom of the screen will tell you how much time you have left.
12: The timer will progressively fill as you play the game. Some guests are needier than others, meaning the timer will fill faster!
13: If the timer fills and you haven't yet completed the order, the current request will reappear to remind you of what to make!
14: Serafina might also get a little discouraged... if she messes up too many times, she'll fail her assignment!
15: Each guest will have different dishes they'd like to be served. Make sure to remember which one to make before the request window disappears!
16: That's all for the tutorial, good luck!

0: Oh my... that journey sure was something. I'm starving.
1: It smells amazing in here... I hope I'll have enough room for dessert!
2: Hello there! Are you the maid who will be serving to me? It's a pleasure to meet you! I'm Letti.
3: I've heard you just completed your training. I'm excited to see what your mentor has taught you!
4: You wouldn't happen to make anything sweet? Like maybe a cake, or perhaps a sundae...
5: Ah, but of course I would love to sample your meals as well!
6: (O-oh my! Doesn't she work at that famed aquatic lab by the southern ocean..?)
7: (Things that are sweet...perhaps I should focus on providing desserts.)
8: Please take your time serving me! I want to try your very best dishes!

0: This lake is lovely! My clients must be around here somewhere...
1: Serving two clients once is awfully unusual. And they booked me so late! This better have been worth it.
3: Thanks for coming out. Name's Annie, and this is my brother Alex! Say hi, Alex!
5: We're out here on vacation. Figured we might as well see the sights before we hit the road again, y'know?
6: We really appreciate you taking our request so last minute. Wouldn't be a vacation without some good eats, right, Alex?
8: Perhaps a few savory meals would improve our time here. I admit I am intrigued by the services you advertised.
9: It was Annie who requested you. Please do not make me regret her decision.
10: Oh, don't mind him! He's just cranky from not eating all day. I'm sure you'll do great!
11: (Who on earth are these people?! Are they just two young no-name wizards..?)
12: (Nevertheless, they were able to pay my late fee. Perhaps they're celebrities from some far-off land.)
13: (If I do well, maybe they can advertise my services in places I've never been!)

0: Home sweet home! And not too late today either. I suppose I should tidy up a bit before bed.
5: Oh, sorry about that. I guess I'm a bit late, aren't I? Name's Gob, I think I reserved your manor for dinner a few hours ago?
6: I would have come earlier but I got held up at work. I'm sure you know how that feels!
7: ...I guess you'll be getting held up right now. Sorry about that.
8: You got anything sweet? Or filling maybe? I haven't had time to eat all day. I'm starving!
9: Hey, and uh, take your time making the food and all that, but I'm sure we'd both like to try to turn in as soon as we can.
10: (And here I thought I'd get to go to bed early!)
11: (Although, from what I remember from his reservation, he works for a fairly well-known curse manfacturer... I don't want to get on his bad side...)

0: (The sun has barely risen... who on earth reserved me this early?)
3: I have heard good things about your services.
6: I want to taste it all.
7: I want to see what it is like to be...human.
8: I expect prompt and perfect service. Do not disappoint me.
10: (That's one of Lady Lacrimosa's artificial handmaidens!)
11: (I must be on my best behavior, lest I draw the lady's wrath...)

0: My first week as a maid has been a huge success!
1: I'm getting reservation requests left and right, I'll have to start being more selective...
2: Hmmm, I wonder who I should serve next..?
3: Thank you for playing Maid Rush Madness!
4: You can replay any of the challenges from the main menu, and even try out endless mode!
